title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a web application built with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to help users monitor and manage their sleep patterns and identify potential sleep debt. This project, tagged with the 'typescript' topic, allows users to input their sleep schedule, calculate sleep debt based on their desired sleep duration, and visualize their sleep data for better sleep hygiene management.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the LaTeX source code and generated HTML output for my resume. It serves as a project showcasing my skills in typesetting documents with TeX and presenting information effectively on the web. The resume is maintained and built using LaTeX, allowing for precise formatting and easy updates, while the HTML version offers a readily accessible online alternative.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard is a project utilizing JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS to create a user-friendly interface for monitoring and visualizing data from a Robofleet system. This dashboard aims to provide real-time insights into robot status, performance metrics, and mission progress, facilitating improved operational awareness and decision-making within robotic fleets.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-Idea-Board is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed as a visual brainstorming and project management tool. This application allows users to capture, organize, and develop ideas into actionable plans using a flexible and intuitive board interface. It's a personal project focused on providing a clean and efficient way to manage projects and track progress, leveraging modern web technologies for a responsive and user-friendly experience.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a full-stack project built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router), TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI), designed as a central hub for developers to manage projects and tasks. It leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and caching, incorporating modern web development practices to create a performant and user-friendly experience. This repository showcases a practical application of these technologies, offering a valuable learning resource for developers interested in building similar applications.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a full-stack web application built with TypeScript, CSS, JavaScript, and HTML, leveraging Express.js and Vite.js to provide a platform for interacting with the Gemini API. This project showcases a practical implementation of the Gemini API within a modern web framework, demonstrating best practices in TypeScript development and front-end UI design.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a JavaScript-based project creating a visually appealing and interactive event calendar. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this repository provides a customizable framework for displaying and managing events dynamically. Its focus is on providing a user-friendly calendar interface that can be easily integrated into various web applications.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: iot-asset-tracking is a Next.js-based project leveraging Supabase for backend functionality and Tailwind CSS for styling to create a modern IoT asset tracking application. Built with TypeScript, this repository demonstrates a comprehensive solution for managing and monitoring assets in real-time, focusing on a user-friendly interface and efficient data handling.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, contains projects focused on applying Python to various financial analyses and tasks. It explores topics within finance through practical code examples and implementations, aiming to provide a hands-on learning experience in leveraging Python for financial modeling, data analysis, and potentially other related areas.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: This repository hosts a project focused on map visualization, leveraging HTML for the front-end interface and Python for data processing and potentially map generation (e.g., using libraries like Folium). It demonstrates techniques for creating interactive and informative maps, making it suitable for learning about data representation and geospatial visualization.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a CRUD application built with Python, Flask, and PostgreSQL, leveraging HTML, CSS, and shell scripting for a comprehensive web project. This repository showcases a practical implementation of basic database operations and server-side logic, providing a valuable learning resource for those interested in full-stack Python development.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and shell scripting designed for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. This project provides a user-friendly interface to parse, filter, and display ROS log data, making it easier to debug and understand robotic system behavior. It aims to improve ROS development workflows by offering a clear and interactive view of log information.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a project showcasing a modern voting application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This repository explores the implementation of a user-friendly and responsive voting system, focusing on clean code architecture and leveraging the power of Next.js for server-side rendering and routing. It serves as a learning resource and practical example for developing interactive web applications.

title: atg-world
description: atg-world is a project built using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, focusing on [insert project's specific purpose or goal based on README - e.g., creating an interactive globe visualization, simulating a virtual world environment, etc.]. This repository showcases [mention key functionalities or features - e.g., data visualization, user interaction, real-time updates, etc.] and serves as a learning platform for exploring front-end web development techniques.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project showcasing a modern, responsive dashboard built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. It demonstrates best practices in front-end development, utilizing Next.js features for efficient routing, server-side rendering (SSR), and API integration to create a dynamic and user-friendly data visualization experience.

title: raven-v2

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a comprehensive e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router), TypeScript, and React, leveraging MUI for a rich user interface and React Query for efficient data fetching and caching. This project demonstrates a full-stack implementation focusing on type safety and modern web development practices, showcasing key aspects of building scalable and performant online stores.
